text: This obsoletes IRM 4.13.8, Reconsideration, Exam SFR Reconsiderations

The material relating to Exam SFR Reconsiderations previously contained in IRM section 4.13.8 is incorporated into retitled IRM section 4.13.5, Exam SFR Reconsideration, because most of the content of prior IRM 4.13.5, Automated Substitute for Return (ASFR) dated 12-31.2009 was duplicated or obsolete. Automated Substitute for Return (ASFR) has been removed from title. Guidance for the ASFR program is in IRM 5.18.1, Automated Substitute for Return (ASFR) Program.
